H3.text: Who was the author of 혩Pygmalion'. GB Shaw

A4.text: Pygmalion (1913) is a Shavian study of language and speech and their importance in society and in personal relationships.

A5.text: Shaw provided the screenplay for a filmed version of Pygmalion for which he received an Academy Award.
